Key Match Events: Argentina's second-half goals from Alexis Mac Allister, Julián Álvarez, and Paulo Dybala sealed the 3-0 win over Chile
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina played without talismans Lionel Messi and Ángel Di María, who received a tribute at the Monumental stadium after his international retirement
Post-Match Reflections: Argentina strengthened their grip on top of the South American World Cup qualifying with 18 points, five clear of second-placed Uruguay
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina's comfortable win was their first competitive fixture since 2013 without Lionel Messi or Angel Di Maria
Others: The match took place at Mâs Monumental in Buenos Aires, Argentina, with an attendance of 52,160
